vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_FUND.CashOut (patch_14.sol#27-37):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_14.sol#32-35)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (patch_14.sol#33)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_FUND.CashOut (patch_14.sol#27-37):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_14.sol#32-35)
	- TransferLog.AddMessage(msg.sender,_am,CashOut) (patch_14.sol#34)
	External calls sending eth:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_14.sol#32-35)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- locked (patch_14.sol#36)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_FUND.Deposit (patch_14.sol#18-25):
	External calls:
	- TransferLog.AddMessage(msg.sender,msg.value,Deposit) (patch_14.sol#22)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lastBlock (patch_14.sol#23)
